name: @murphyl/files2json
description: CLI program that reads json/markdown/toml/yaml and prints it as JSON.

scripts.test: node src/index.js --matter=toml package.json test/source/ node_modules/ --out test/target/a
scripts.test2: node src/index.js -vp --matter=toml package.json test/source/ node_modules/ --out test/target/c.json
scripts.test3: node src/index.js -vp --files --matter=toml package.json test/source/ node_modules/ --out test/target/d
scripts.test5: node src/index.js -vp --files --format=toml --matter=toml package.json test/source/ node_modules/ --out test/target/toml
scripts.test6: node src/index.js -vp --files --format=yaml --matter=toml package.json test/source/ node_modules/ --out test/target/yaml

author: murph
